title: Average sales per unit of Outback Steakhouse restaurants in the U.S. 2015 to 2018
yAxis: Average sales in thousand U.S. dollars
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average sales in thousand U.S. dollars, containing a total of 4 data points.
Overall Average sales in thousand U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Average sales in thousand U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2015 to 2017, and lastly roughly constant from 2017 to 2018.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2016 and 2017.
Maximum Average sales in thousand U.S. dollars, about 3580.0 was reported at Year 2018
The lowest Average sales in thousand U.S. dollars, of value 3354.0 was reported at Year 2016
